name: MailTester.AI
tagline: Forward an email and get an AI deliverability report in 30s
description: Stop guessing how your emails perform. MailTester.ai instantly analyzes newsletters, campaigns, or community emails, giving actionable insights to boost engagement, open rates, conversions and saving you hours of guesswork.

name: RightNow AI Code Editor
tagline: The first GPU-native code editor with AI
description: RightNow AI is the first CUDA-native code editor. It brings real-time GPU profiling, AI optimization, GPU virtualization, and a full emulator into one environment, helping developers build faster and more efficient CUDA applications

name: Nuxt UI v4
tagline: Open-source UI library built with Tailwind CSS
description: Create beautiful, responsive & accessible web apps quickly with Vue or Nuxt. Nuxt UI is an open-source UI library of 100+ customizable components built with Tailwind CSS and Reka UI.

name: Spit Notes
tagline: A songwriting app that keeps your lyrics and audio together
description: For songwriters who juggle voice memos and notes. Spit Notes is the iOS app that finally connects audio to your lyrics. Capture inspiration instantly & never lose a song idea again.

name: Dolby Vision¬Æ 2
tagline: Go beyond HDR with more AI and ‚Äòauthentic motion‚Äô smoothing
description: Stunning HDR imaging technology that brings extraordinary color, contrast, and brightness to the screen. Version 2 promises ‚Äòauthentically cinematic‚Äô use of motion smoothing, and settings that make content look the best depending on your TV and lighting.

name: Dropstone
tagline: AI IDE that learns and improves itself as you code
description: Dropstone: World's first generational recursive self-improvement AI for autonomous programming. Desktop application with MCP Server, Computer Use API, unlimited Ollama models, Claude Code integration, and Agent Mode.

name: Ghost Note
tagline: An innovative privacy focused approach to code documentation
description: Ghost Note is a VS Code extension that lets you attach comments directly to the symbols in your codebase ‚Äî without modifying the source code. Attach comments, images, videos, and tags to symbols in your codebase, without ever touching the code.

name: Ziyo
tagline: A powerful Japanese Kanji dictionary & search engine
description: Ziyo is a ùò¥ùòµùò∂ùò±ùò™ùò•ùò≠ùò∫ simple Japanese online Kanji dictionary and search engine. Perfect for learners. Enter anything you have in mind about a Kanji and Ziyo will search it for you: English meanings, Kana, Chinese, Pinyin, Hangeul, and Romaji!

name: Nexion - For Windows & Open Source
tagline: A cross-platform blockchain Shell Client based on XLayer
description: üéâ Big news! Windows version + Open-source release! Our latest release includes: ‚úÖ Native Windows support ‚úÖ Open-source codebase ‚úÖ Testnet & Mainnet versions Try it now ‚Üí https://github.com/AceXiamo/Nexion

name: Enhance
tagline: Turn your new tab into a daily boost of calm + productivity.
description: A beautiful, distraction-free new tab. fresh daily backgrounds, quick notes,dock to store shortcuts and focus-friendly widgets to boost your productivity in a clean, minimal design.

name: Snippetly
tagline: Your snippet vault. Save, organize & share code snippets
description: Snippetly helps developers and teams capture, organize, and share code snippets instantly. Build your personal snippet vault with tags, search, and sharing for faster workflows and better collaboration.

name: Skippership
tagline: AI-Powered Website & User Behavior Analytics
description: Get full session replays, interactive heatmaps, goal and funnel tracking, and unlimited event capture. Track console errors, filter and segment data as needed, and retain data for as long as you require. No limits on sites, journeys, or actions.

name: PrioSpace
tagline: All-in-One Productivity App
description: Prio Space: The private, all-in-one productivity app. Master todos, habits, & focus with a Pomodoro timer. Works offline with no data collection. Sync tasks across devices seamlessly with built-in P2P sharing. Your productivity, your data.

name: Focus Matrix
tagline: Unlimited, Free, Fully Private Eisenhower matrix
description: If you love Eisenhower matrix, You're going to love this.. Eisenhower matrix is 50+ years old, Focus matrix is the modern day version - which allows you to add infinite tiles, instead of 2X2 - you can create 4X4, rename and order them as you like and more.

name: TalentOS
tagline: Game for your Career
description: A game for your career that helps you build real skills, track your growth, and connect with opportunities based on merit, not just credentials.

name: Slane
tagline: The minimalist task manager for solo builders
description: The minimalist task manager designed for solo builders. No teams, no clutter - just one clean list to help you stay in flow.

name: GEOScore AI
tagline: AI-powered Search Analyzer for Generative SEO
description: Optimize your content for AI search engines with 8-dimensional analysis: Clarity, Depth, Credibility, Relevance, Structure, Usefulness, Originality & User Intent. Get actionable insights to rank in ChatGPT, Perplexity & Gemini.

name: Caffeine Clock
tagline: The best caffeine tracker that will help you limit caffeine.
description: Track your caffeine intake with the most comprehensive caffeine tracker app. Know exactly how much caffeine you have at any time with our database of 200+ items. Improve your sleep quality by managing your caffeine consumption effectively.

name: World of Maps
tagline: A daily globe puzzle: guess the data planet is showing free
description: Love Wordle and GeoGuessr? üåé WorldOfTheMaps is a new daily geography challenge where the globe always has a story. Each day, you‚Äôll see a mysterious dataset visualized on Earth ‚Äî Your job: guess what data the planet is presenting.

name: DomNest
tagline: Manage all your domains in one dashboard
description: Domnest makes domain management stress-free. Monitor domains, SSLs, and website uptime in real time. Get smart alerts for expiries and downtime, track renewals, and manage everything from one clean dashboard.
